Interface IProviderManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProviderManager

    public interface IProviderManager
    ProviderManager API exposed to users.

    1.0

    ron barnoy

      • Configure

        void Configure(ProviderProperties providerProperties)
        Configure all available providers using curr_provider properties providerProperties
        Parameters:
        providerProperties - target properties need for initialization of all providers

      • SignOut

        void SignOut()
      throws java.lang.Exception
        invoke current provider to sign out
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - this exception is thrown in case there the current provider is not initialized

        Returns:
        the matching curr_provider

      • getProvider

        IProvider getProvider()
        method for exposing the Provider object to client applications.
        Returns:
        an IProvider which attached to specific Provider derived object based on ProviderType property

      • setProvider

        void setProvider(IProvider provider)
        sets the current provider
        Parameters:
        provider - a provider object reference

      • setProvider

        void setProvider(ProviderProperties providerProperties)
        sets the current provider
        Parameters:
        providerProperties - allocates new provider according to properties

      • setProvider

        void setProvider(ProviderType providerType)
        sets current provider by supplying a providerType
        Parameters:
        providerType - allocates new provider according to providerType enum value
